Quarter: The fiscal quarter during which the bonuses were issued, e.g., 'Q3 2024'.
Number_of_Bonuses: The total number of bonuses issued to employees during the specified quarter.
Total_Bonus_Amount: The total monetary value of all bonuses issued in the specified quarter.
Average_Bonus_Amount: The average amount of bonus awarded per employee during the specified quarter.
Company_Performance_Impact: A qualitative description of how the bonus distribution aligns with or impacts company performance metrics.
Bonuses aligned with moderate company growth
Employee bonuses do not address the core DR Question focus area
Bonuses aligned with steady company growth
Reduced bonuses due to budget constraints
Bonuses issued to retain key talent
Performance bonuses for achieving quarterly targets
Increased bonuses due to high performance
